Question:
Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

10, 100, 200, 310, ?
A. 400
B. 410
C. 420
D. 430

Choose the correct alternative that will continue the same pattern and replace the question mark in the given series.

11, 10, ?, 100, 1001, 1000, 10001
A. 101
B. 110
C. 111
D. None of these
Solution: The pattern is - 1, x 10 + 1, - 1, x 10 + 1, - 1, x 10 + 1, .....So, missing term = 10 x 10 + 1 = 101.
